properties.name: grpc.python-mrl-amis.host
properties.description: Host where Python gRPC server is running

properties.name: grpc.python-mrl-amis.max-retry-attempts
properties.description: Maximum retry attempts for failed requests

properties.name: grpc.python-mrl-amis.polling-interval-seconds
properties.description: Polling interval in seconds for checking job status

properties.name: grpc.python-mrl-amis.polling-max-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of polling attempts before timeout

properties.name: grpc.python-mrl-amis.port
properties.description: Port where Python gRPC server is listening

properties.name: grpc.python-mrl-amis.request-timeout-seconds
properties.description: Request timeout in seconds (should be long for MRL-AMIS processing)
